resources.string:
Hi, my name is Begum. 
 
I love cats. 
 
The kind that is alive and runs around. 
Fun fact is that I have several cats. 
And sometimes I even go to vet. 
And even less sometimes, I actually help a cat. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to look after your own cat. 
You should ask someone else about being veterinarian, though. 
 
I also like dogs 
But I am allergic to dogs. 
So, I should get an allergy shot to own a dog.
 I would like to have a Husky or a Golden Retriever.
